Either Anya removed a change later or it didn’t get checked in some how, but I see one think missing from the Makefile given Angelo’s input above.  I also just checked the repo.   This line in the Makefile:
cd ./sdk/node && npm install && sudo npm install -g typescript && sudo npm install typings --global && typings install
should also install npm or else Travis will fail, so the line should be as follows
cd ./sdk/node && sudo apt-get install npm && npm install && sudo npm install -g typescript && sudo npm install typings --global && typings install
But Angelo, in your case, obviously npm is installed and should be the same since you’re in vagrant.  Did you create a new vagrant env?
I just did that and ran “make node-sdk-unit-tests” and it didn’t work because of some other changes to the Makefile that are also missing.   It is not building the peer & membersrvc executable
